channel.title: RSPS Console by me - released v2! you can now open .java files with it
channel.description:
[center][b][size=15pt]RuneScape Private Server console[/size][/b][/center] [center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]
[b]Description[/b] [i]I have just released my RuneScape Private Server console. Stuck on finding your compiler, runner, or java files? Than download this! A little application that allows you to run or compile your server fast. Please don't flame about this, it's my first program![/i]
[b]Updates:[/b] [i]Added buttons to edit your server files! (thx for the tip ScriptScape)[/i]
[b]Usage[/b] [i][b]You need to change the names of these batch files from your server:[/b] the compiler: compile.bat the runner: runserver.bat the compile and runner: compile_and_run.bat
extract this app into your main server source map, and run it.[/i]
[b]Download[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=94977.0;attach=6504][i][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/icons/clip.gif[/img] Download from MoparScape[/i][/url]
[b]Screenshot[/b] [i]If many people request this, i want to upload one.[/i]
[b]Credits[/b] [i][b]Jakkie123[/b] 95%: Builded the program [b]Freddy1990[/b] 5%: said how to make an URL in Delphi (thanks Freddy)[/i]
[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]
[b]Note: If this is the wrong section: sorry, and move this.
No viruses[/b]
[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]
[size=8pt][i]Sorry for my not-so-good English language... [b]and if you need help, post your question!

item.title: RSPS Console by me - released v2! you can now open .java files with it
item.dc:creator: @scriptscape scriptscape
item.description:
@scriptscape wrote:

You need to change the names of these batch files from your server: the compiler: compile.bat the runner: runserver.bat the compile and runner: compile_and_run.bat

extract this app into your main server source map, and run it.


Another little tip…
if they can’t find their server source how could they change the name
and place the program in their main server source?
You Should make it so your program can find the files from anywhere

Not Meaned As Offense Or Flame

EDIT:

may i have open-source version by pm
i don’t gonna leech i just wanna help you
and maybe i gonna make my own console
for other goals
Note: if you don’t want your code released
i won’t spread it

-=Nick Ajax Hardcore=-[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 05:02:50 PM[/size][hr][quote=“crazycam10, post:5, topic:65332”]You Should Post This In Download Section Too

If It Already Isnt There :|[/quote]

item.title: RSPS Console by me - released v2! you can now open .java files with it
item.dc:creator: @scriptscape scriptscape
item.description:
@scriptscape wrote:

[quote=“jakkie123, post:3, topic:65332”][quote author=scriptscape link=topic=94977.msg985635#msg985635 date=1173394332]
Hey,
I Don’t gonna flame you
But if you cant find your compiler or runserver
You can’t find your .java &class files too
So you can’t edit your server
It’s better to tell them to use the search function on their computer
So nobody need your program…

Not meaned as offense!

-=Nick Ajax Hardcore=-
[/quote]
yeh i have just updated it, thx for the tip scriptscape, now uploading…
edit: uploaded![/quote]
ok i try it
let’s see if it works
and maybe i could help you with developing if you like

-=Nick Ajax Hardcore=-

Edit: I Like It Great Work
But I Don’t Gonna Use
Maybe I Gonna Post In My Server Tutorial V3.5
(if i may)

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Console by me - released v2! you can now open .java files with it
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[center][size=15pt]RuneScape Private Server console[/size][/center]
[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]

Description
I have just released my RuneScape Private Server console.
Stuck on finding your compiler, runner, or java files? Than download this! A little application that allows you to run or compile your server fast.
Please don’t flame about this, it’s my first program!

Updates:
Added buttons to edit your server files! (thx for the tip ScriptScape)

Usage
[i]You need to change the names of these batch files from your server:
the compiler: compile.bat
the runner: runserver.bat
the compile and runner: compile_and_run.bat

extract this app into your main server source map, and run it.[/i]

Download
Download from MoparScape

Screenshot
If many people request this, i want to upload one.

Credits
Jakkie123 95%: Builded the program
Freddy1990 5%: said how to make an URL in Delphi (thanks Freddy)

[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]

[b]Note: If this is the wrong section: sorry, and move this.

No viruses[/b]

[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]

[size=8pt][i]Sorry for my not-so-good English language…
[b]and if you need help, post your question!

Read full topic
